content:
From: Cliff Jones <cliff.jones@newcastle.ac.uk>
After several requests (maybe linked to (Chinese) New Year), the submission deadline has been extended to
February 22, 2014: Abstracts (extended)
March 1, 2014: Submission of papers (extended)

See:
http://cs.nju.edu.cn/setta/

Invited Speakers also announced!
